node.html:
Our Mission

We are a pioneer in developing and providing decentrialized commercial applications on blockchains.

Our mission is to enable secure, innovative, decentralized solutions to real-world business requirements.

node.html:
Renhao Li (Datu)

Founder & CEO

Oliver is a blockchain technology enthusiast. He have been developing DApps on EOS since 2018. Prior to that, he is a professional online game developer, have more than 5 years working experience in game creation and development. Oliver holds the Master Degree in Computer Science from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) and gradudated from Beijing Jiaotong University with the major of computer science.
node.excerpt: Renhao Li (Datu) Founder & CEO Oliver is a blockchain technology enthusiast. He have been developing DApps on EOS since 2018. Prior to that, he is a professional online game developer, have more than 5 years working experience in game creation and development. Oliver holds the Master Degree in Computer Science from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) and gradudated from Beijing Jiaotong University with the major of computer science.

node.html:
Sylvia Huo

Co-Founder & CFO

Sylvia is a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA). She is a professional financial consultant at Prudential. Prior to that, Sylvia previously worked as a Senior Accountant at China Telecom Global. She received her Master Degree in Applied Accouting and Finance from Hong Kong Baptist University.

node.html:
DApps

Decentrialized applications (DApps) empower reliable and efficient digital assets management and transaction.
node.excerpt: DApps Decentrialized applications (DApps) empower reliable and efficient digital assets management and transaction.

node.html:
Blockchains

We support and utilize the most cutting-edge blockchains including but not limited to ETH, EOS, Ontology, Cosmos and Polkadot.
node.excerpt: Blockchains We support and utilize the most cutting-edge blockchains including but not limited to ETH, EOS, Ontology, Cosmos and Polkadot.

node.html:
Security

Leverage strict audit and multi-encryption to secure commercial applications and crypto assets.
